source.3151d7f1:
Wcount = WordCloud(width=1100,height=600,stopwords=STOPWORDS).generate(' '.join(df.title))
plt.imshow(Wcount)
plt.axis('off')
plt.title("Most frequent words in the titles",fontsize=20)
plt.show()
source.07a797ff:
Wcount1 = WordCloud(width=1100,height=600,stopwords=STOPWORDS).generate(' '.join(df.tags))
plt.imshow(Wcount1)
plt.axis('off')
plt.title("Most frequent tags",fontsize=20)
plt.show()

source.f51cb0d8: #### The purpose of this notebook is to run exploratory data analysis on the Youtube video trending statistics, to examine what relevant correlations and other insights can be found in the dataset. This analysis will focus on the US region.
source.06170161: #### For the purposes of this EDA, it's not necessary to include all columns. The redundant columns will be deleted.
